body.raw:
{
  "title": "Comprehensive Multi-Department Investigation - Harassment, Fraud & Security Breach",
  "description": "Complex case involving systematic workplace harassment, financial fraud ($125K), and data security breaches affecting 200+ employees. Requires coordinated investigation across HR, Legal, and CSIS departments with full entity tracking and comprehensive evidence management per enhanced PRD requirements.",
  "dateReceived": "2025-01-07",
  "escalationChannel": "HR_HOTLINE",
  "complainantName": "Dr. Sarah Michelle Johnson",
  "complainantEmail": "sarah.johnson@citigroup.com",
  "complainantPhone": "+1-555-0123",
  "priority": "HIGH",
  "sensitivity": "CONFIDENTIAL",
  "departmentId": 1,
  "caseTypeId": 2,
  "allegations": [
    {
      "allegationType": "HARASSMENT",
      "severity": "HIGH",
      "description": "Systematic workplace harassment including inappropriate verbal conduct, unwelcome advances, and creation of hostile work environment targeting female subordinates. Pattern of behavior documented over 3+ months with multiple witnesses. Includes verbal abuse, inappropriate comments, and intimidation tactics.",
      "involvedPersons": ["Michael Wilson (Subject/SVP - Investment Banking)", "Jennifer Adams (Primary Victim/VP - Direct Report)", "Lisa Parker (Secondary Victim/VP - Peer)", "Tom Smith (HR Witness/Director)", "Multiple team members (witnesses)"],
      "incidentDate": "2024-12-15",
      "incidentLocation": "40th Floor Conference Room, Citicorp Center, NYC",
      "reportedDate": "2025-01-05",
      "investigationFunction": "HR",
      "grcTaxonomy": {
        "level1": "CONDUCT",
        "level2": "WORKPLACE_MISCONDUCT",
        "level3": "HARASSMENT",
        "level4": "VERBAL_HARASSMENT"
      }
    },
    {
      "allegationType": "DISCRIMINATION",
      "severity": "HIGH",
      "description": "Gender-based discrimination in promotion decisions, salary adjustments, and high-visibility project assignments. Statistical analysis shows pattern of bias against female team members in compensation and advancement opportunities over 18-month period.",
      "involvedPersons": ["Michael Wilson (Subject/SVP)", "Jennifer Adams (Affected/VP)", "Lisa Parker (Affected/VP)", "HR Compensation Team", "Executive Review Committee"],
      "incidentDate": "2024-11-01",
      "incidentLocation": "Executive Review Meetings, Various Locations",
      "reportedDate": "2025-01-05",
      "investigationFunction": "HR",
      "grcTaxonomy": {
        "level1": "CONDUCT",
        "level2": "WORKPLACE_MISCONDUCT",
        "level3": "DISCRIMINATION",
        "level4": "GENDER_DISCRIMINATION"
      }
    },
    {
      "allegationType": "FINANCIAL_FRAUD",
      "severity": "CRITICAL",
      "description": "Systematic falsification of expense reports totaling approximately $125,000 over 18 months. Includes personal vacation expenses ($8,500), inflated meal costs with altered receipts ($12,300), fabricated client entertainment events ($15,200), and personal purchases disguised as office supplies ($4,800). Evidence includes credit card statements, receipt documentation, and system audit trails.",
      "involvedPersons": ["Michael Wilson (Subject/SVP)", "Finance Approval Team", "Corporate Card Administrator", "Travel Department", "External Vendors (entertainment)"],
      "incidentDate": "2024-06-01",
      "incidentLocation": "Corporate Credit Card System - Multiple Locations",
      "reportedDate": "2025-01-06",
      "investigationFunction": "LEGAL",
      "estimatedLoss": 125000,
      "currency": "USD",
      "grcTaxonomy": {
        "level1": "FINANCIAL",
        "level2": "FRAUD_MISCONDUCT",
        "level3": "EXPENSE_FRAUD",
        "level4": "FALSIFICATION"
      }
    },
    {
      "allegationType": "DATA_BREACH",
      "severity": "HIGH",
      "description": "Unauthorized access to confidential employee records including compensation data, performance reviews, and personal information of over 200 employees. Access logs show systematic data mining outside normal business requirements. Potential violation of GDPR, CCPA, and internal data protection policies.",
      "involvedPersons": ["Michael Wilson (Subject/SVP)", "IT Security Team", "Data Protection Officer", "System Administrators", "Affected Employees (200+)"],
      "incidentDate": "2024-12-20",
      "incidentLocation": "Corporate HR System - Digital Access (Remote)",
      "reportedDate": "2025-01-07",
      "investigationFunction": "CSIS",
      "affectedRecords": 200,
      "dataTypes": ["COMPENSATION", "PERFORMANCE", "PERSONAL_INFO", "CONTACT_DATA"],
      "grcTaxonomy": {
        "level1": "INFORMATION_SECURITY",
        "level2": "DATA_PROTECTION",
        "level3": "UNAUTHORIZED_ACCESS",
        "level4": "EMPLOYEE_DATA"
      }
    },
    {
      "allegationType": "RETALIATION",
      "severity": "HIGH",
      "description": "Retaliatory actions implemented after initial harassment complaints were filed, including schedule modifications, project reassignments, negative performance feedback, social isolation tactics, and exclusion from key meetings. Pattern escalated following formal HR complaint submission.",
      "involvedPersons": ["Michael Wilson (Subject/SVP)", "Jennifer Adams (Affected/VP)", "Lisa Parker (Affected/VP)", "Team Members (witnesses)"],
      "incidentDate": "2025-01-02",
      "incidentLocation": "Investment Banking Floor, Various Meetings",
      "reportedDate": "2025-01-07",
      "investigationFunction": "HR",
      "grcTaxonomy": {
        "level1": "CONDUCT",
        "level2": "WORKPLACE_MISCONDUCT",
        "level3": "RETALIATION",
        "level4": "ADVERSE_ACTION"
      }
    }
  ],
  "riskAssessment": {
    "overallRisk": "HIGH",
    "reputationalRisk": "HIGH",
    "financialRisk": "MEDIUM",
    "legalRisk": "HIGH",
    "regulatoryRisk": "MEDIUM",
    "mediaRisk": "HIGH"
  },

    "boardNotification": false,
    "auditCommitteeNotification": true,
    "regulatoryReporting": true,
    "lawEnforcementReferral": "PENDING",
    "mediaMonitoring": true
  }
}

body.raw:
{
  "caseId": "{{test_case_id}}",
  "narrativeType": "INVESTIGATION_SUMMARY",
  "investigationFunction": "HR",
  "title": "HR Investigation Summary - Harassment and Discrimination Claims",
  "narrativeText": "This comprehensive investigation summary documents the systematic harassment and discrimination allegations against Michael Wilson, SVP in Investment Banking.

**Key Findings:**
1. **Pattern of Harassment**: Multiple incidents documented over 3+ months involving inappropriate verbal conduct, unwelcome advances, and creation of hostile work environment
2. **Gender Discrimination**: Statistical analysis reveals pattern of bias in promotion decisions and salary adjustments affecting female team members
3. **Witness Corroboration**: Primary witnesses Jennifer Adams and Lisa Parker provide consistent testimony with supporting evidence
4. **Policy Violations**: Clear violations of Corporate Harassment Policy sections 2.3, 2.7, and Equal Opportunity guidelines

**Investigation Timeline:**
- Dec 15, 2024: Initial harassment incident reported
- Jan 5, 2025: Formal complaint filed
- Jan 7, 2025: Investigation initiated
- Ongoing: Witness interviews and evidence collection

**Recommended Actions:**
1. Immediate administrative leave pending investigation completion
2. Coordination with Legal for potential employment action
3. Support services for affected employees
4. Policy training review for entire department

**Next Steps:**
Complete witness interviews within 5 business days, finalize evidence review, coordinate with Legal and CSIS teams for comprehensive resolution approach.",
  "confidentialityLevel": "RESTRICTED",
  "authorId": 40,
  "reviewRequired": true,
  "keyFindings": ["Pattern of harassment documented", "Gender discrimination evidence", "Multiple witness corroboration", "Clear policy violations"],
  "estimatedDuration": 15,
  "milestones": ["Witness interviews", "Evidence review", "Coordination meetings", "Final recommendations"]
}

request.description: Test comprehensive narrative creation with unlimited text and investigation details
